English:
An "evil pilgrimage," you say?
In all likelihood, that's where Sakura has gone.
Chinese:
「惡魔巡禮」啊……
小櫻去參加的可能性確實非常高。
Korean:
"악마순례"인가…
역시 사쿠라 군도, 그곳에 가 있을 가능성이 높을 것 같군
German:
Eine „dunkle Pilgerfahrt“, sagst du?
Da ist Sakura mit hoher Wahrscheinlichkeit hin.

English:
And the evil pilgrimage seems to be aptly named.
Jimiken may be a frightful man in more ways than
one.
Chinese:
不過話說回來，惡魔巡禮這個名字真有趣
Jimmy Ken……從各種方面來說都是非常恐怖的男人啊
Korean:
그건 그렇고, 악마순례라니 굉장한 네이밍 센스로군
지미KEN… 여러 의미로 무서운 남자일지도 모르겠는걸
German:
Und der Name der dunklen Pilgerfahrt scheint
Programm zu sein. Jimiken ist wohl auf mehr als
eine Weise furchterregend.

English:
And I just finished looking into that music video.
That disturbing video was...
Chinese:
對了，剛好我也查完了那個MV，
那個噁心的MV是……
Korean:
맞아맞아, 마침 그 PV에 관한 조사가 끝난 참이거든
그 불쾌한 PV는―
German:
Ich bin gerade mit dem Musikvideo fertig geworden.
Das verstörende Video war ...

English: Ah! [p]! You're here!
Chinese: 啊！[p]！你在這裡！
Korean: 앗! [p]! 여기 있었구나!!
German: Ah! [p]! Du bist hier!

English:
Hey, what's this all about? Everywhere you go,
that Jimiken video is playing!
Chinese:
我說啊，這到底是什麼一回事？
街上到處都在放吉米肯的MV耶！
Korean:
저기, 이게 대체 어떻게 된 거야?
거리 여기저기가 온통 지미켄의 PV투성인데요!
German:
He, was soll das denn?
Überall wird dieses Jimiken-Video gespielt!

English:
Does this relate to the questions you were asking,
[p]?
Chinese: [p]，難道這跟你那一連串的問題有關嗎？
Korean: 혹시, 아까 [p]의 질문 공세와 뭔가 관계 있는 거야!?
German:
Hat das was mit deinen Fragen vorhin zu tun,
[p]?

English:
But look at that!
Even here you've got that video playing!
Chinese:
啊啊啊！
連這裡都在放吉米肯的MV！
Korean:
어, 그와악!
여, 여기까지 지미켄의 PV가!
German:
Schau sich das einer an!
Sogar hier wird das Video gespielt!

English:
The video's got some fiendish stuff encoded into
it. I'd try to avoid watching much of it if I were
you.
Chinese:
那個MV被動了手腳，
不要盯著看太久比較好。
Korean:
그 PV에는, 어떤 장치가 되어 있어
너무 유심히 보지 않는 편이 좋아
German:
In das Video ist ganz schön fieses Zeug kodiert.
Ich würde mir das an deiner Stelle lieber nicht
anschauen.

English: Wait, what? Fiendish?
Chinese: 什麼……？手腳？
Korean: 에? …어, 어떤 장치?
German: Moment, was? Fieses Zeug?

English:
You may have heard of this particular trick.
It's called "subliminal messaging."
Chinese: 妳有聽過「 閾下效應」嗎？
Korean:
들어본 적 있는가?
"서브리미널 효과"라는 거다
German:
Du hast von dieser Methode vielleicht schon mal
gehört. So genannte subliminale Botschaften.

English: Subdermal messages?
Chinese: 「 遇嚇效應」……？
Korean: …모라토리엄 효과?
German: Minimale Botschaften?

English:
Subliminal messages. Simply put, messages are sent
directly to the brain by slipping images from one
video into another so fast they can't be seen.
Chinese:
「 閾下效應」就是……簡單來說，
就是把人眼無法看到的細碎影像，夾雜在一段影片中播出，
直接把訊息傳送到腦裡。
Korean:
서브리미널 효과란… 간단하게 말하자면
하나의 영상에, 눈으로는 쫓을 수 없는 짧은 영상을 끼워 넣어서
뇌에 직접 메시지를 보내는 것이다
German:
Subliminale Botschaften. Bilder aus einem Video
werden in einem anderen so schnell abgespielt,
dass man sie nicht bewusst wahrnimmt.

English:
That video is subliminally set to be as addictive
as a drug. It effectively hypnotizes you.
Chinese:
那個MV裡藏著具有「 閾下效應」的影片，
會引起類似毒品的慣性和依賴性反應，也就是「催眠」。
Korean:
저 PV에는 마약과도 같은 상습성, 의존성을 가져오는
서브리미널이 들어가 있지 ―즉 "최면"이다
German:
Dieses Video ist unterschwellig darauf gepolt,
dich zu hypnotisieren und süchtig nach dem Video
zu machen wie nach einer Droge.

English:
What's scarier is what it makes you do afterward.
There's a post-hypnotic suggestion built in.
Chinese:
更麻煩的是，連催眠覺醒後發動的
“後催眠暗示”也暗藏其中。
Korean:
더욱 성가신 건, 최면에서 깬 후에 발동하는
"후최면암시"도 들어가 있다는 점이다
German:
Erschreckender ist jedoch, wozu es dich danach
anstiftet. Es enthält eine posthypnotische
Suggestion.

English:
I don't have any idea what you're talking about, 
but that's what made Sakura disappear?
Chinese:
……雖、雖然我完全聽不懂，
總之小櫻之所以會不見，都是被這玩意害的吧！？
Korean:
…무, 무슨 말인지 전혀 모르겠지만
사쿠랏치가 사라진 건, 그것 때문이라는 거죠!?
German:
Ich verstehe kein Wort, aber ist Sakura so
verschwunden?

English: Without a doubt.
Chinese: 應該不會錯。
Korean: 아마도, 말이지
German: Ganz zweifelsohne.

English: The suggestion includes a certain URL.
Chinese: 後催眠暗示中，被放入了一組URL。
Korean: 후최면에는, 어느 URL이 심어져 있어서 말이지
German:
In der Suggestion ist eine bestimmte URL
versteckt.

English:
I couldn't get the whole address, but it strongly
resembles the area in which we captured the
Digimon medal thief.
Chinese:
雖然還無法完整解析出來，
但那組URL跟搶奪數碼寶貝獎牌的犯人
所在的區域位址非常類似。
Korean:
완전히 알아내진 못했지만
디지몬 메달을 강탈한 범인을 붙잡은 에어리어와
주소가 흡사해
German:
Ich bin nicht an die vollständige Adresse
gekommen, aber es sieht nach dem Gebiet aus,
in dem wir den Medaillendieb gestellt haben.

English:
The location is on Kowloon Lv. 4.
Get there ASAP and check it out for me.
Chinese:
場所就在「Kowloon Lv.4」！
你趕緊出發，去那裡調查看看吧！
Korean:
장소는「쿠롱 Lv.4」다
바로 가서, 조사해 주도록
German:
Das liegt auf der vierten Ebene in Kowloon. Geh so
schnell wie möglich hin und schau dich da um.

English:
Darn it, [p]!
Why didn't you tell me?!
Chinese:
真是的！[p]！
你怎麼不早跟我說呢！？
Korean:
정말! [p]!
어째서 알려 주지 않았던 거야!?
German:
Verflucht, [p]!
Warum hast du mir nichts gesagt?!

English:
Cause I'm going too!
Sakura's my friend. I have to help!
Chinese:
先說好，我也要去喔！
我一定要去把小櫻救出來！
Korean:
나도 갈 거니까!
사쿠랏치를, 구해야 해!
German:
Ich komme nämlich mit!
Sakura ist meine Freundin. Ich muss ihr helfen!

English: That jerk of a devil-worshipping idiot!
Chinese: 那個傻瓜殿下惡魔狂……我絕～對饒不了他！
Korean: 그 바보 악마 마니아 녀석… 절~대로 용서 못해!
German: Diese dumme Nuss von einer Teufelsanbeterin!
